description: Attribute of a logical data model entity

primary_key.description: Whether the attribute is part of the PK defined for the owning entity

data_domain.description: A database column data type or a user-defined data type

required.description: Information about whether the attribute is optional vs mandatory

default_value.description: A value that the column based on this attribute is automatically prepopulated when a new record is inserted

derived.description: Information about whether the value for column based on this attribute is calculated from other columns or not

persistent.description: Information about whether the LDM attribute is intended to be persisted when transformed to column or is meant to be only in logical model

surrogate_key.description: Information about whether the LDM attribute is intended to be persisted when transformed to column or is meant to be only in logical model

sequence_number.description: The ordinal number of attribute within the entity

description.default: Attribute of a logical data model entity
